captions.text: do you have a secret
something you never told anyone. think about how much of yourself you keep from
other people. what you share
is just the tip have a massive iceberg and it's the same
with everyone around you
so why do we see people to keep secrets from us
as dishonest, when we don't see ourselves the same way
no matter how damaging, neuroscientists agree
it's better to share your secrets. your brain
is naturally wired to tell the truth. when you keep a secret
your brain simulates how awful the reveal will be
and floods with the rush of stress hormones, this affects your memory
your sleep and your ability to fight
off disease
studies have even shown that people with deep secrets
perceive Hills as steeper than people without them
the larger the secret
the steeper the hill
But once you divulge your secrets, you may find
it's not as terrible as you thought. holocaust victims
with a long buried memories, showed incredible health improvements when they
started sharing their stories
and the more they shared the more their health improved
the moment you reveal a secret you lose a kind of power
A dark mysterious part of you is laid bare for
others because now they've seen the real you
But maybe it's not a loss at all
maybe that hill isn't so steep
maybe the only parry you lost is the one the secret
had over you know
so what's your secret?

comments.text:
My secret is that.. A while back, my Grandpa had some type of cancer or 
something medical. He was in the hospital for months! At first, I felt bad 
for him.. But then I started getting tired of having to take a one and a 
half hour drive to see him every week end (Which that long of driving 
really, really isn't that bad. Stop complaining, Frankie!) And I had a 
thought once as I was walking out of the hospital.. My thought was "Oh, 
maybe he really will die.. That would be good, I hope it happens." My eyes 
widen and I stopped just a second, thinking about what I just thought. 
"Nononono." That night I went to my room and prayed. I just couldn't 
believe I'd thought that! I love you, I love you, I love you, Mr. 
Grandpa!!! <3﻿

comments.author: Shoyras

comments.text:
Ok I've been reading all these comments and I've seen that most of them are 
really deep, sad, and hit me right in the feels. So I want to say something 
that I hope will help.

You know who's beautiful?<--- Read the word in the beginning of the 
sentence.


I think everyone in the world has inner beauty. Everyone can be wonderful. 
It shouldn't matter how you look, how you talk, or even how you think. 
Everyone is beautiful inside. Don't judge anyone. Be as kind as you can to 
anyone you meet. Who knows, maybe one day you can help someone out of 
depression. I wish that some day we could all just live in a world where 
nobody would be judge for what they look like, but judged by their true, 
inner self. Heck, people shouldn't be judged at all. Everyone is beautiful. 
Nobody can change that. Words can't change that, not even physical contact 
can change that. Now c'mon, people, gimme a virtual hug and promise to 
never judge anyone again.﻿

I've been reading lots of secrets that all of u wrote and most of them 
(well all of it) is very,very sad and here is my secret (and I'm sorry for

I'm 11,I've been called stupid in kindergarten for 3 or more years. When I 
was in middle school I was the quit one in class for 5 years. People say 
that I'm ugly,stupid,likes to show off and going to school late. I go to 
school late because my house is far away from school. I think suicidal 
sometimes I tink how its like to die but then I try my best not to. When 
the teachers not in class I would draw and they would call my "attention 
whore" . I used to have one friend let's call her Freda . OK Freda was a 
friend of mine for 5 years and when I was in fifth grade she change. She 
change into someone that is different when I was alone she will call me 
"lone girl" she will call me "Asian girl" I MEAN WHAT'S WRONG FOR BEING 
ASIAN?!?!??!! Any way from a sweet kind girl to someone horrible. My 
parents r g8 but my was not my real mom. I was adopted my real mum is the

My mom she wants everything to be perfect and everyday my parents will ask 
me to do revisions (Asian) and if I get bad grades my mom will punish me . 
I wanted to runaway from home or a new place but since I'm still young I 
can't .


That's all I have for now hope u enjoy! ﻿

comments.text:
One of my secrets:


I regret ever having friends. I feel like I don't deserve any, because I 
feel like I am a mean person. I regret telling people secrets, especially 
someone I don't feel really close to.

I only have 1 friend that I trust, even though I know about 50 people, and 
I still never told her my deep secrets, just the normal secrets.

I rarely trust anyone. Even if we say we are bffs, and that we say that we 
will never keep secrets from ourselfs, I lie. I don't feel like we are even 
close to being friends, and I am keeping deep secrets from you.


Not to long ago, I told one of my deep secrets to this girl that hangs out 
with me, that I don't trust AT ALL. I only told her my secret because she 
pressured me into telling her, and I regret it so much.﻿

others. I have worse secrets, but I won't post them where the people I know 
could see them. When it comes down to it, I'm a bad person.  ﻿
comments.author: Hemaima Proctor

comments.text:
All i think about is love i wish i could stop and i wish i would dissapear 
to stop the suffering i caused and will cause to other people family and my 
dad, i want to stop being lazy and leave my conputer.﻿
comments.author: TheZWarrior

comments.text:
my secret is I've hated myself since i was 13 years old (now almost 18) 
I've never told anyone how much I hate myself and am so terribly disgusted 
by myself. I've self harmed for 2 years now and have gone in and out of 
starving myself so that I can be beautiful (I've never really been 
successful with that though) when I was 12 i first thought of running away 
because I knew no one would care, when I was 13 I thought of killing myself 
because no one would care. I don't think as much about killing myself now. 
Only two people that personally know me know that I cut myself, one found 
out the other I personally admitted to. I wish I hadn't because I feel like 
I gave her the idea of harming herself and I'm scared that she will one 
day, or already has without telling me and I never want to be the cause for 
someone so dear to me hurting themselves. No one that personally knows me 
knows how much I truly hate my ugly, fat, terrible self nor does any one 
know that I've ever starved myself to lose weight. when I was 12 my so 
called best friend told everyone that I bullied her (when it was the 
opposite) as did her older brother, and her younger siblings called me fat 
and ugly. from that day on I believed I was fat because to be perfectly 
honest they were right. I've never looked at myself the same way.﻿
comments.author: Jillian W

comments.text:
I'm so glad that I shared my secrets. Afterwards, I felt so relaxed and 
free.﻿
